result: CORRETO 28) The happiness, therefore, is the best, the noblest and the most pleasant thing in the world, and these attributes should not be separated as in the existing inscription in Delphi “from things, the noblest is the fairest, and the better health is better; But the sweetest is to have what we love. ” All of these attributes are present in the most excellent activities, and among these the best, we identify it as happiness.
